mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, REQUESTERID, ACCOUNTID, PASSPHRASE, FROMNAME, FROMCOMPANY, RETURNADDRESS, FROMCITY, FROMSTATE, FROMPOSTALCODE, FROMZIP4, FROMCOUNTRY, FROMPHONE, FROMEMAIL, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATEDESCR, RECREDITAMOUNT, POSTAGEBALANCE, ASCENDINGBALANCE from DB_ENDICIAUSER where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
